alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 10:57PM CST until January 11 at 11:30PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL CONWAY AND NORTHERN FAULKNER COUNTIES... At 1056 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wooster, or 8 miles north of Conway, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Conway... Greenbrier... Wooster... Quitman... Guy... Enola... Twin Groves... Mallet Town... Pickles Gap... Springhill... Woolly Hollow State Park... Springfield... Holland... Barney... Enders... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
